data.title: Port Aransas, TX United States - Harpers Berry 5SC
data.meta_description: Book this Sleeps 10, 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms. Dogs allowed. Located in Port Aransas, TX United States
data.text:
Introducing Harpers Berry 5SC.

This gorgeous coastal cottage is located right in the middle of Port Aransas—walking distance to the beach and Town. The open living room and kitchen has plenty of seating for the family to gather for breakfast, dinner, and game night. The primary bedroom will have a king size bed and all three guest rooms will boast queen size beds. Additionally, there's a comfortable queen size sleeper sofa in the living room. Harpers Berry is pet friendly and offers wireless internet. There is also plenty of room to park a boat and the beach is only a mile away. The small complex also offers a community pool with plenty of seating and only shared by 10 homes. Escape to Harpers Berry and experience the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and coastal charm. STR#382864

HIGHLIGHTS

- Pet-Friendly (see below)

- Screened patio

- Community pool

- Nearby boat ramps

- Numerous restaurants and area attractions nearby

BEDROOM CONFIGURATION

- Primary Bedroom: King bed, TV

- Bedroom 2: Queen size bed, TV

- Bedroom 3: Queen size bed

- Bedroom 4: Queen size bed

- Additional Bedding: Queen-size sleeper sofa in the living area

AMENITIES

- Washer and dryer

- BBQ grill available

- Outdoor lounge

- Free Private Wi-Fi

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

- A 2-3 night minimum stay is required.

- Contracting guests must be at least 25 old, have a valid State Driver’s License or other acceptable ID, and present throughout the entire stay

- This is a PET-FRIENDLY RENTAL. Pet fees are an additional $20.00+tax, per pet, per night. A maximum of 3 pets are allowed, a pet-cleaning fee is also charged, which is $50 for stays of 7 days or less, $75 for stays of 8-29 days, and $100 for stays of 30 or more days.

- We do not accept Klarna payments.

- Cable and Wi-Fi service in Port Aransas can be unreliable due to the unique coastal environment in which we live. We appreciate your understanding that these services are beyond our control. No discounts or refunds will be given for service disruptions.

"Harpers Berry" is a premier vacation rental property provided by Port A Escapes, professionally managed to ensure that everything is expertly handled before your arrival, and includes:

- 24/7 guest support

- Professional cleaning to the highest standards

- Pre-arrival inspection performed by one of our team members

- Clean towels & linens

- A well-equipped kitchen

- These starter supplies are provided in the property as a convenience until you can go shopping: hand/bath soap, shampoo & conditioner, toilet paper, paper towels, dish soap, dishwasher detergent, trash bags, and a sponge.

LOCATION

Port Aransas, Texas, is a charming coastal town that attracts over 6 million visitors annually. Nestled on Mustang Island along the Gulf of Mexico, Port Aransas offers a laid-back, picturesque setting perfect for year-round getaways. With its favorable climate and stunning natural surroundings, Port Aransas is conveniently located just a short drive from major cities, including Corpus Christi, Austin, Houston, and San Antonio. Visitors can look forward to a genuinely inviting experience, with a wide range of activities such as beachcombing, fishing, birdwatching, and exploring the town's vibrant arts scene. Additionally, the town's proximity to attractions like Mustang Island State Park, the Texas State Aquarium, and the historic charm of downtown Port Aransas promises a diverse array of experiences for every visitor. Whether it's enjoying fresh seafood at local restaurants, shopping for unique souvenirs, or simply soaking in the relaxed coastal vibe, Port Aransas offers endless possibilities for an unforgettable vacation.

Port A Escapes has made every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information provided on this website. However, there is no guarantee that the information is completely accurate, and it may contain errors or omissions. Prices, house contents, and features are subject to change or withdrawal without notice.
